Detailed Description

A class provides input method information. 

 #include <gaia/service/InputMethodInfo.h>
 using namespace gaia::service;

 InputMethodManager* pImm = new InputMethodManager();
 Vector<InputMethodInfo*> infoList = pImm->getInputMethodListN();
 String id = infoList.itemAt(i)->getId();

 delete pImm;
 for(size_t i;i<infoList.size();i++) {
     delete infoList.itemAt(i);
 }

Package name string
gaia::base::String gaia::service::InputMethodInfo::getSettingsActivity ( ) const

Return the class name of an activity that provides a settings UI for the input method.

You can launch this activity be starting it with an gaia::core::Demand whose action is MAIN and with an explicit gaia::core::ComponentName composed of getPackageName and the class name returned here.

A NULL will be returned if there is no settings activity associated with the input method.

Returns:
Class name string
gaia::base::String gaia::service::InputMethodInfo::loadLabel ( const gaia::core::PackageManager &  pm) const

Load the user-displayed label for this input method.

Parameters:
[in]pmSupply a PackageManager used to load the input method's resources.
Returns:
Label string
